mapper.select: /* 0. 테이블 전체 조회 */ SELECT t.id, t.category_id, c.category_name, t.detail, t.lat, t.lng, t.place, t.region FROM tptp AS t INNER JOIN category c ON t.category_id = c.category_id ORDER BY t.id LIMIT 100;

/* 3-1. 지역별 카테고리별 관광지 개수 -> 자연경관 */ SELECT t.region, c.category_name, COUNT(t.id) as `count` FROM tptp t INNER JOIN category c ON t.category_id = c.category_id WHERE c.category_name = '자연경관' GROUP BY t.region, c.category_id ORDER BY t.region ASC;

/* 3-1. 지역별 카테고리별 관광지 개수 -> 문화재 */ SELECT t.region, c.category_name, COUNT(t.id) as `count` FROM tptp t INNER JOIN category c ON t.category_id = c.category_id WHERE c.category_name = '문화재' GROUP BY t.region, c.category_id ORDER BY t.region ASC;

/* 3-1. 지역별 카테고리별 관광지 개수 -> 테마공원 */ SELECT t.region, c.category_name, COUNT(t.id) as `count` FROM tptp t INNER JOIN category c ON t.category_id = c.category_id WHERE c.category_name = '테마공원' GROUP BY t.region, c.category_id ORDER BY t.region ASC;

/* 3-1. 지역별 카테고리별 관광지 개수 -> 관광지 */ SELECT t.region, c.category_name, COUNT(t.id) as `count` FROM tptp t INNER JOIN category c ON t.category_id = c.category_id WHERE c.category_name = '관광지' GROUP BY t.region, c.category_id ORDER BY t.region ASC;
